casebody.data:
John B. HUTTO, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 8643. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 7, 1938. Grady Gillon, of Macon, Ga., for appellant. T. Hoyt Davis, U. S. Atty., and John P. C.owart, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Macon, Ga.

Before FOSTER, HUTCHESON, and HOLMES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed.
